rewrite1:
For the third paragraph, please set the outline level to 6. Make sure to remove any bold formatting from the text, switch the font to Arial, and insert a 10-point space after the paragraph.

Moving to the seventh paragraph, change the line spacing to single. Then, increase the space following the paragraph to 1 centimeter, apply an underline to only the words (not spaces), and italicize the text.

Regarding the text you've selected, align it to the right and create a 2.5-line space below it. Change the font color to the hex value #FFFF00, and adjust the right indent to negative 0.5 character width.
rewrite2:
Please make the following changes to the document:

In the third paragraph, change the outline level to 6, remove any bold formatting, switch the font to Arial, and insert a 10-point space following the paragraph.

In the seventh paragraph, modify the line spacing to a single line, increase the space after the paragraph to 1 centimeter, underline the text using the 'word underline' option, and italicize the text.

For the text you've selected, align it to the right, add a 2.5 line space beneath it, color the font using the hex code #FFFF00, and adjust the right indent to negative 0.5 character width.
rewrite3:
Regarding the third paragraph: please set it to Outline Level 6, remove any bold formatting, switch the font to Arial, and include a 10-point space following the paragraph.

For the seventh paragraph: change the line spacing to Single, augment the space after the paragraph to 1 centimeter, apply an underline that only affects the words (not the spaces), and italicize the text.

For the selected text: align it to the right, create a 2.5-line space below it, color the font with the hexadecimal code #FFFF00, and adjust the right indent to negative 0.5 character width.
